memberdef.argsstring: (bool const value, hate::Passkey< Chip, PlaybackProgram > const &passkey) SYMBOL_VISIBLE
memberdef.name: set_enable_buffered_readout

briefdescription.para: Enable or disable external voltage output for this neuron.

simplesect.para: As only one neuron per chip can provide voltage output, access to this setting is disabled for single neurons.

briefdescription.para: Digital configuration of a single neuron.

simplesect.para: Figure 1b of the paper "A highly tunable 65-nm CMOS LIF neuron for a large scale neuromorphic system".
